scripts.prepare:sdk:ts: rimraf sdk-patched && cd interface_sdk-js/build-tools && npm i && node handleApiFiles --path .. --type ets --output ../../sdk-patched
scripts.prepare:sdk:arkts:dts2ets: cd interface_sdk-js/build-tools && npm i && node handleApiFiles --path .. --type ets2 --output ../../sdk-patched-arkts
scripts.prepare:sdk:arkts:ets2arkui: cd interface_sdk-js/build-tools/arkui_transformer && npm i && npm run compile:arkui && node . --input-dir ../../../sdk-patched-arkts/api/@internal/component/ets/ --target-dir ../../../sdk-patched-arkts/api/arkui/component/
scripts.prepare:sdk:arkts: rimraf sdk-patched-arkts && npm run prepare:sdk:arkts:dts2ets && npm run prepare:sdk:arkts:ets2arkui
scripts.prepare:sdk: npm run prepare:sdk:ts && npm run prepare:sdk:arkts
scripts.download:sdk: node ./tools/download-sdk.mjs && npm run patch:sdk && npm run prepare:sdk
scripts.compile: npm run compile --prefix external/incremental/compat && npm run compile --prefix external/incremental/common && npm run compile --prefix external/interop
scripts.release: npm run compile && npm run -C arkgen compile && npm run -C core compile && npm run -C linter compile && npm run -c arktscgen compile && node tools/release.mjs
scripts.sanity: npm run -C arkgen sanity && npm run -C linter run
